alert.note: Alert for Lehigh; Upper Bucks; Western Montgomery (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 7:26PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Lehigh, north central Montgomery and northwestern Bucks Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 725 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Green Lane, or 18 miles south of Allentown, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Quakertown, Perkasie, East Greenville, Schwenksville, Green Lane, Zionsville, Geryville, Spring Mount, Telford, Sellersville, Pennsburg, Coopersburg, Red Hill, Richlandtown, Trumbauersville and Harleysville. This includes Northeast Extension between mile markers 32 and 51. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for eastern and southeastern Pennsylvania.
